description: Try our easy to follow Slow Cooked Lamb Mushroom Ragu With Pappardelle recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Slow Cooked Lamb Mushroom Ragu With Pappardelle
name: Slow Cooked Lamb Mushroom Ragu With Pappardelle Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Divide pasta and lamb ragu among serving bowls. Top with parmesan and basil leaves. Serve with baby rocket and lemon wedges.
